text: The Diocese of Mariestad () was a diocese of the Church of Sweden, established in 1580, and disestablished in 1646. It was disbanded following the establishment of the Diocese of Karlstad. Spanning across the Swedish historical provinces of Värmland and northern Västergötland, it used the Mariestad Cathedral as its seat. ==Superintendents== *Jesper Marci 1580–1592 *Mattias Marci Molitaeus 1592–1603 *Petrus Henrici Melartopaeus 1605–1610 *Jonas Oriensulanus 1612–1646 Mariestad Category:16th-century establishments in Sweden Category:Disestablishments in Sweden Category:1580s establishments in Europe Category:1640s disestablishments in Europe
title: Diocese of Mariestad
